modName: Peer Cottage - Riverwood Player Home - WITJL
summary: This mod is currently just a player home in Riverwood with some additions to Riverwood. I intend to add more to this other than just improving Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/49282850/Logo.png[/img]
100 Downloads, thank you guys so much!!!!!!
Thank you all for the screenshots, I will add them to the main ones soon.

This mod contains these features:
-> A Player Home added to Riverwood near the mountain.
-> Some minor additions to Riverwood's exterior.
-> A Dragon Follower *Cancelled*

I intend to add these features:
-> A questline including the dwemer and lore behind them.
-> New followers, characters, enemies, spells, shouts, races.

For regular updates and news [url=http://www.facebook.com/dtoxify]click here[/url].
author: dtoxify

files.name: Well isnt this just lovely - Release Build 7
